医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器学习发现了用于疫苗和免疫治疗的有效免疫调节剂称为免疫调节剂的小分子可以帮助创造更有效的疫苗和更强的免疫疗法来治疗癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Machine-learning-uncovers-pot-immunomodulators-for-vaccines-and-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Machine-learning-uncovers-pot-immunomodulators-for-vaccines-and-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5def86d-e30d-410c-8b94-240d0e0b4f15 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:59:00 -0500 Machine learning uncovers potent immunomodulators for vaccines and immunotherapy
干细胞衍生的脑细胞有望治疗阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校的研究人员发现了一种对一种脑细胞发育至关重要的蛋白质，这种脑细胞被认为在阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病等疾病中发挥着作用，并首次利用这一发现从干细胞中培养出神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Stem-cell-driven-brain-cells-hold-promise-for-Alzheimers-Parkinsons-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Stem-cell-driven-brain-cells-hold-promise-for-Alzheimers-Parkinsons-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31c5036d-b162-40f3-8a75-2cccdeec734c Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:54:59 -0500 Stem-cell-derived brain cells hold promise for Alzheimer's, Parkinson's research
欧洲抗生素消费量反弹至大流行前水平今年的欧洲抗生素宣传日 (EAAD) 重点关注 2023 年理事会建议中概述的目标，以加强欧盟 (EU) 采取“同一个健康”方法应对抗菌素耐药性的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Antibiotic-conspiration-in-Europe-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Antibiotic-conspiration-in-Europe-rebounds-to-pre-pandemic-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22965af1-a8b8-435d-bb90-9f5fb3d89d56 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:44:14 -0500 Antibiotic consumption in Europe rebounds to pre-pandemic levels
挪威研究探讨哪些药物最能预防偏头痛偏头痛不仅仅是头痛。疼痛常常伴有恶心、呕吐、光敏感和声音敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Norwegian-study-looks-at-which-medicines-best-prevent-migraine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Norwegian-study-looks-at-which-medicines-best-prevent-migraine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bd7f1c3-297d-4e99-a56e-3aa801572e39 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:38:07 -0500 Norwegian study looks at which medicines best prevent migraine
为患有精神疾病的无家可归退伍军人开苯二氮卓类药物的做法尽管无家可归人群物质使用障碍和过量死亡的风险较高，但尚未对针对该人群开出的苯二氮卓类药物进行检查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Benzodiazepine-prescribing-practices-for-homeless-veterans-with-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Benzodiazepine-prescribing-practices-for-homeless-veterans-with-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83ebaf09-da95-407b-b549-cc2e7cfe76a8 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:31:50 -0500 Benzodiazepine prescribing practices for homeless veterans with mental illness
研究显示新冠肺炎后脑膜炎明显复发巴斯德研究所的一组科学家利用国家脑膜炎球菌参考中心的数据库追踪了 2015 年至 2022 年间法国侵袭性脑膜炎球菌疾病病例的演变，发现在 2015 年放松控制措施后，该病出现了前所未有的死灰复燃。 COVID-19 疫情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-reveals-significant-post-COVID-meningitis-resurgence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-reveals-significant-post-COVID-meningitis-resurgence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e52e5a8d-745a-460a-9aae-6e7c56c5be06 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:16:33 -0500 Study reveals significant post-COVID meningitis resurgence
微量营养素缺乏与肠道微生物组变化和抗生素耐药性有关不列颠哥伦比亚大学的研究人员发现了微量营养素缺乏与生命早期肠道微生物群组成之间的惊人联系，这可能有助于解释为什么全球范围内抗生素耐药性不断上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Micro Nutrition-deficicies-linked-to-gut-microbiome-shifts-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Micro Nutrition-deficiency-linked-to-gut-microbiome-shifts-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c7d976c-362f-41bc-8b29-e95fafacf1c2 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:11:43 -0500 Micronutrient deficiencies linked to gut microbiome shifts and antibiotic resistance
简单的肥皂溶液可能会改变对抗疟疾的游戏规则长达数十年的抗击疟疾之战的解决方案能否像肥皂一样简单？在《公共科学图书馆被忽视的热带病》上发表的一项新研究中，德克萨斯大学埃尔帕索分校的科学家对此提出了令人信服的理由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Simple-soap-solution-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Simple-soap-solution-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef464691-ec5e-4ed3-bc94-6569a7133019 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 22:15:17 -0500 Simple soap solution could be a game-changer in the fight against malaria
研究发现纳米塑料与帕金森病和痴呆症有关纳米塑料与大脑中天然存在的特定蛋白质相互作用，产生与帕金森病和某些类型的痴呆症相关的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-links-nano Plastics-to-Parkinsons-disease-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-links-nano Plastics-to-Parkinsons-disease-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40aab3ae-adbc-4cfd-a99a-0a734ceca3e8 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 21:54:40 -0500 Study links nanoplastics to Parkinson's disease and dementia
对肺癌细胞“记忆”的新理解提出了新的治疗方法纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的研究人员发现，对肺癌细胞“记忆”的新认识提出了一种改善治疗的新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-understanding-of-lung-cancer-cells-memories-suggests-novel-treatment-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-understanding-of-lung-cancer-cells-memories-suggests-novel-treatment-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6b6269f-be58-4413-88b9-cfe86f97327a Fri, 17 Nov 2023 21:28:25 -0500 New understanding of lung cancer cells' 'memories' suggests novel treatment approach
